name: iChess 2
description:
iChess 2 is the Chess-Simulator for iPad and iPhone, with difficulty levels that can be adjusted to suit the skills of the individual player. For this reason, iChess 2 is suitable for all types of players, from absolute beginners who want to learn the game, right up to professional-level players seeking a real challenge.

• Strong Artificial Intelligence:
Extremely strong chess engine that provides even professional players with a challenge.

• Single-Player Mode:
Play against the chess computer in single-player mode.

• Multi-Player Mode:
In multi-player mode you can compete against all of your friends.

• Adjustable Difficulty:
The level of difficulty can be continuously adjusted between 1 and 100.

• Different Engine Modes:
Choose from five different chess computer playing styles, from passive to aggressive.

• Ideal For Beginners Too:
Displays legal moves and comments.

• Intuitive Controls:
Move the figures exactly as if they're on a real chessboard.
